name: AceCad Software Ltd
description:
AceCad Software delivers advanced software products and services for the construction industry.

These include specialist software products for BIM review and collaboration and design to construction project management.

BIMReview is a low-cost BIM project review and collaboration tool with exceptional capability for communicating to project teams.

BIMProject enables BIM models from leading design authoring tools to be imported and data extracted for all downstream supply management including tendering and purchasing to the construction site.

product_images.title: BIMReview
product_images.description: Collaborative review and visual communication from design to the construction site. Import BIM models and associated data from multiple CAD authoring tools and instantly access project information.

product_images.title: BIMProject
product_images.description: BIM Content Management for the construction supply chain. Real-time project controls, supply management and construction planning to deliver projects on time, in budget and at reduced risk to stake holders
